titleStmt.title: Humble and modest proposals tender'd to the consideration of both houses of Parliament, for uniting the Protestant interest in the nation for the present age, and preventing our divisions for future
titleStmt.author: Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for C.P. and are to be sold in the Strand,

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to William Sherlock.
